lead_paragraph: LEAD: Miguel Lora of Colombia, the World Boxing Council bantamweight champion, won a unanimous 12-round decision over Albert Davila of Pomona, Calif., Aug. 1 at the Forum in Inglewood, Calif., but the California Athletic Commission announced yesterday that traces of two banned drugs had been found in the urine of Lora in postfight tests.
